Metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28851 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2020-28851 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package multus is earlier than 4.0.2-1, affected by CVE-2020-28851
